mapper.sql: id, collect_id, template_id, contact_group_id, enable, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag,callback_url
c.id, c.collect_id, c.template_id, c.contact_group_id, c.enable, c.create_date, c.create_by, c.update_date, c.update_by, c.del_flag,c.callback_url

c.id as "c.id", c.collect_id as "c.collect_id", c.template_id as "c.template_id", c.contact_group_id as "c.contact_group_id", c.enable as "c.enable", c.create_date as "c.create_date", c.create_by as "c.create_by", c.update_date as "c.update_date", c.update_by as "c.update_by", c.del_flag as "c.del_flag",c.callback_url as "c.callback_url"

t.id as "t.id", t.name as "t.name", t.metric_id as "t.metric_id", t.tags as "t.tags", t.notify_level as "t.notify_level",t.enable as "t.enable", t.remark as "t.remark", t.del_flag as "t.del_flag", t.create_date as "t.create_date", t.create_by as "t.create_by", t.update_date as "t.update_date", t.update_by as "t.update_by"

ct.id as "ct.id", ct.name as "ct.name", ct.email as "ct.email", ct.phone as "ct.phone", ct.dingtalk as "ct.dingtalk", ct.wechat as "ct.wechat", ct.twitter as "ct.twitter", ct.facebook as "ct.facebook", ct.email_enable as "ct.email_enable", ct.phone_enable as "ct.phone_enable", ct.dingtalk_enable as "ct.dingtalk_enable", ct.wechat_enable as "ct.wechat_enable", ct.twitter_enable as "ct.twitter_enable", ct.facebook_enable as "ct.facebook_enable", ct.phone_time_of_freq as "ct.phone_time_of_freq", ct.dingtalk_time_of_freq as "ct.dingtalk_time_of_freq", ct.wechat_time_of_freq as "ct.wechat_time_of_freq", ct.twitter_time_of_freq as "ct.twitter_time_of_freq", ct.facebook_time_of_freq as "ct.facebook_time_of_freq", ct.phone_num_of_freq as "ct.phone_num_of_freq", ct.dingtalk_num_of_freq as "ct.dingtalk_num_of_freq", ct.wechat_num_of_freq as "ct.wechat_num_of_freq", ct.twitter_num_of_freq as "ct.twitter_num_of_freq", ct.facebook_num_of_freq as "ct.facebook_num_of_freq", ct.create_by as "ct.create_by", ct.create_date as "ct.create_date", ct.update_by as "ct.update_by", ct.update_date as "ct.update_date", ct.del_flag as "ct.del_flag"

r.id as "r.id", r.template_id as "r.template_id", r.aggregator as "r.aggregator", r.relate_operator as "r.relate_operator", r.logical_operator as "r.logical_operator", r.queue_time_window as "r.queue_time_window", r.value as "r.value", r.alarm_level as "r.alarm_level",r.del_flag as "r.del_flag"
mapper.insert: insert into umc_alarm_config (id, collect_id, template_id, contact_group_id, enable, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag,callback_url) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contactGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update umc_alarm_config
collect_id = #{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact_group_id = #{contactGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
callback_url = #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update umc_alarm_config set collect_id = #{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact_group_id = #{contactGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, callback_url = #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from umc_alarm_config where enable=1 and del_flag!=1

select * from umc_alarm_config c left join umc_alarm_template t on t.id=c.template_id left join umc_alarm_config_collect cc on cc.config_id=c.id left join app_instance i on i.id=cc.collect_id where c.template_id=#{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and i.endpoint=#{collectAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ,, ,,m.metric as "m.metric",m.classify as "m.classify" from umc_alarm_config c left join umc_alarm_template t on c.template_id = t.id left join umc_metric_template m on m.id=t.metric_id left join umc_alarm_rule r on t.id = r.template_id left join umc_alarm_contact_group_ref gr on gr.contact_group_id = c.contact_group_id left join umc_alarm_contact ct on gr.contact_id = ct.id left join app_instance i on c.collect_id = i.id left join app_host h on i.host_id=h.id where i.endpoint = #{endpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and h.hostname = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.del_flag!=1 and c.del_flag!=1 and r.del_flag!=1
